1.content:
Your name is Y/N and you are a wizard. Well, to be more accurate an amateur wizard. You have a variaty of spells and just aquired a new one called shrink. In the booklet, you read that the shrunken object/person becomes immune to damage or pain, so it was perfect for a macrophile like yourself. You also had the ability to enter different realities by the form of the spell teleportation, which you had confirmed also worked on fictional works such as anime or cartoons. Even books or live-action shows weren't exempt. If you went to a live-action show there would be no sets, the characters would just be themselves.

Since you had recently acquired the power to shrink inside your favorite forms of media you decided to transport into a...

A: Anime
B: Cartoon
C: Live-Action
D: Book
E: Something Else?
1.title: Teen Wizard Pervert.

1111.content:
You focus your magical powers while thinking of the mystical ninja world of Naruto. It was also a world full of hot babes, so that's a plus. You snap out of your trance at the entrance of the village, your shrinking spell already applied, because it wouldn't take a genius to find out how ninjas would react to a person just appearing out of nowhere in front of their village.

You had transported yourself into the world of Naruto, the first season in specific. The main reason for this was that it would be much easier to find who you want to find by simply going to the ninja academy since most of the main characters were still in school. Of course, the fact that they were still pre-teens was a little bit of a turnoff, but at the size you are, anything is big, including both male and female body parts from all ages. You easily navigate through the village, using a flying spell to get a high vantage point and Zeroing in on the Ninja Academy.

You propel yourself forward through a window and you find yourself in the class of the main cast of characters. You had many options of who to go to first and probably follow home for the day. First things first, the gender you decided on was a...

1112.content:
You’re flipping through your master’s notes when you find the instructions on a teleportation ring. You’ve been practicing some of the lesser ones along with some other spells lately and you feel confident enough to try it out. All you wanna do is prove you’ve got what it takes to be a good mage as well as take a quick trip to explore another world. It would only be for a little while so what could go wrong? You and your master have done it plenty of times and you feel like you can handle it. You decide to visit a place called Konoha and see what makes it so special.

You cast some of the strongest protection spells you know to prepare for any unfriendly encounters and start creating on the teleportation ring. Making the ring with what you think is the right measurements and amount of magic, you step inside and cast the right spell to activate it. In a flash of light, you feel your body becoming lighter and lighter until you feel your feet hit the ground again.

Where have you landed?
1112.title: Naruto Shippuden

11122.content:
Looking around, you appear to be in a mountainous region based on the vast rock formations and snow capped mountains. A sharp breeze of cold wind pierces you, which makes your tiny body shiver in shock. Wanting to get shelter, you spot a nearby cave and run your little legs as fast you can towards it. Once inside you take a rest as you get some momentary relief. A groan of pain startles you as you hear it coming from deeper in the cave. Following a path of blood, you see a giant woman laying against the cave wall. Blonde hair flows from her head and golden eyes look dazed as she holds her arm against a wound on her torso. Her torn robes gives off a tremendous view of breasts that are gigantic even for a regular sized person. Her hips are pretty big too, with some extra padding on her thighs. She seems to have a lot of other wounds on her, ranging from cuts to even burn marks.

You only know a few healing spells but you decide to do your best to help this giantess. Walking towards her, you do your best to assure her that you’re here to help. “Um, hi there. I’m gonna try and heal you up as best as I can, just please don’t move too much.”

The giant woman’s eyes look down and widen at you in surprise for a few seconds before returning back to her previous dazed look. She doesn’t say anything, but simply nods her head slowly to show agreement. With a grunt, she slowly removes her arm to reveal a deep gash with strange symbols around it. You get as close as you can to it and cast the best spell you can think of to heal it. It takes a few minutes or so but you managed to close most of the wound. As you work on healing some of her other wounds, you feel yourself losing your senses and as you start casting another spell near one of her thighs, you black out.

A cold sensation makes your body shiver and starts to wake you as you hear the voice of a mature woman talking to you. “Hello? Are you alright down there? Finally, you’re waking up! I was beginning to think you’d never wake up again.”

Opening your eyes, you’re greeted with the sight of a giant woman and her golden eyes looking down at you with both curiosity and concern. You appear to be laying in her giant set of hands as you feel the strange texture of the ground you’re laying on. Her thick lips form a curved line to give you a cautious yet relieved smile. Your eyes are having a hard time peeling away from staring at her giant breasts as they sway side to side as she moves her face closer towards you.

“Who, who are you?”

“My name’s Tsunade, I’m a medical ninja from Konoha. Now who are you? And why are you so small? Don’t get the wrong idea, I’m quite grateful for you saving my life, but it’s not everyday I meet someone as tiny as yourself.”

“Well, my names Y/N, I’m a mage, well, a mage in training. I wanted to go explore different worlds so I made a teleportation ring to travel here. But I think I messed up my spells again because now I’m as small as a toothpick. I think it’s safe to say I still need some more training along with some better habits...”

“That may be true, but I think you’ve done a wonderful job with me. You managed to heal wounds that were bigger than your entire body! So don’t feel too bad, you just need some more experience.” she reassures you as she pats your head with one of her fingers.

A sense of pride strikes your heart after you hear these words and can’t help but feel more optimistic about your future with magic. “Thanks Tsunade, that means a lot to me, really it does.”

You try standing up but after 5 or so steps you fall back down. Your body seems to be pretty weak at the moment and moving too much seems to wear you out. A frosty breeze flows through the cave which makes your body shivers in the cold as your skin turns frigid underneath the thin clothing you’re wearing.

“Easy there little guy, you probably used up a lot of energy patching me up. Just take it easy until I heal you up.”

“H-hey Tsunade, can we move s-someplace warm? I’m kinda freezing my butt off at the moment.”

“Don’t worry, I think I have an idea that’ll heal you as well as warm you up. I don’t have as much energy for my usual healing techniques so I’ll have to use one that’s a little...unique.”

“Unique?”

“Well, basically, I’m gonna help you using my....”
11122.title: On the Cold Mountain Ridge

111221.content: Does Tsunade use her boobs or stomach?
111221.title: Boobs or Stomach?

choices: Tsunade makes her way back to the village
1112212.content:
“Well there’s no easy way to say this but I’m gonna fix you up in my stomach.” Tsunade explains as she lifts up her robes to reveal a pudgy pot belly to you. She brings her hand closer to it until you are brushed against the doughy flesh. It’s incredibly soft, not to mention warm, and you wouldn’t mind snuggling up against her belly in order to warm up.

“You mean...you’re gonna eat me?” you ask as you hear a few gurgles and groans emit from inside her stomach.

“Yes, but there’s nothing to worry about, you’ll be fine. With this technique my stomach becomes a place where the occupants are healed as well as protected. I can tell you it’s not a technique I’ve ever had the need to use before until now. So what do you say? Up for it?”

It doesn’t take much of the piercing cold to convince you to go along with her promise of someplace warm and bale to rest. Besides, it doesn’t seem like such a bad idea to be in the belly of a beauty like Tsunade...

“Alright, I trust you Tsunade. I just hope it’ll be comfy enough...”

“Trust me kid, you’ll be in for a real treat. Conveniently you’ll also be a treat for me, hehe.” Tsunade reassures you with a slight chuckle.

With a firm yet gentle grasp of her fingers, you are brought towards Tsunade’s plump lips. Suddenly, she leans in closer and soon enough you’re enveloped by her pillowy lips in a massive kiss. The two walls of lip cover your entire head and most of your torso as they envelop you in a hug. Her lips feel warm and you can’t help but lean into the kiss to soak up the warmth and enjoy the softness around you. A few seconds later she brings her lips back with a sultry smile.

“Enjoy that? Just consider that one of my ways of thanking you for saving my butt earlier. So, you ready?”

Your heart flutters from that wonderful experience but you manage to answer back quickly with a reddened face. “Y-yeah I’m ready when you are Tsunade.”

“Alright, Y/N hope you taste as sweet as you look!” she says as she opens her mouth in preparation. Inside her mouth rests a long, meaty tongue as her throat pulsates in anticipation of your arrival.

Your body is placed inside her mouth and onto her saliva drenched tongue. You can’t help but let out a small shriek of surprise as you feel it move and rub itself against you. It’s slimy and soft surface gives a long lick all over your body and eventually your entire face. It’s a nice sensation and feels like a massage that relaxes and above all warms your body up. You can hear a distinct humm come from Tsunade as she continues to savor your taste with more licks. After a few more licks, her tongue rests flat for a moment until it rises to slide you down Tsunade’s throat. Her throat caresses your tiny body as it slides down slowly until you pass through the esophagus and finally drop into her stomach with wet squelching sound.

You get back onto your feet as you try to adjust yourself to your new surroundings. Pink, fleshy, slimy walls surround you in a spacious area that seems to be as big as a house to you! Your body becomes relaxed as the warmth courses through it as well as feel something else inside your body being restored. The walls in here look puffy and even pillow-like. Curious, you press against the walls and find that your hands sink into the squishy flesh like some sort of slimy beanbag chair. You decide to lay against the wall and to your surprise and delight, it contorts around your body like a meaty hug. Just as you’re starting to relax and take in the softness of stomach flesh, the entire stomach suddenly shakes as you hear a sound rumble above you.

Outside, Tsunade lets out a satisfied, wet belch that echoes throughout the cave. “UUURRP! I gotta hand it to you Y/N, you taste pretty good! You feel pretty nice in there too. So, how’re you holding up in there? The quarters to your liking?”

“Yeah! It’s a bit strange, but it’s actually quite cozy here in your stomach!”

“Pleased to hear it sweetie. Now, it’ll be a long trip back to the village so just kick back and make yourself comfortable.” she replies with a pat of her plump belly and makes her way out of the cave with the speed only a ninja could have.

You snuggle back against her stomach walls and start to drift off as you soak in the soothing flesh and heat of her stomach.


What happens now?
1112212.title: Inside Tsunade’s Soothing Stomach

1113.content:
You decided that going to the Season of Boruto would be best. The biggest reason being that there's no more war, which means less aware ninja and all the characters from the original Naruto are all grown up. Of course, that isn't to say you wouldn't mind having fun with some of the younger characters because at a shrunken size, any age is giant, including the body parts that come along with it.

You transport yourself to the world of Boruto, having shrunk yourself before leaving. You appear at the front gate of the Leaf Village, immediately noticing the large modern buildings that came about from the war ending, confirming that you jumped to the right place.

You look around and see _____ leaning on a building and decide to hitch a ride.
1113.title: Boruto: The Next Generation

choices: She recognizes you as a human
She thinks your just a weird looking bug
11131.content:
You see Sarada leaning up against a nearby wall. Seems like she’s waiting for something or someone, but you’re not certain. Nevertheless, she’ll probably be your best bet to make contact with, since everyone else around her seems to be walking around.

You quickly make a run toward her, hoping to not get too much attention with the world around you.

Finally you reach the bottom of her feet, And she clearly towers like a 400ft titan above you. However, comparing yourself to her size, your probably on 3 inches tall in reality.

“Hey! Hey, down here” you shout toward her. She begins looking to left and right, probably because she heard your voice. “Down here, I’m down here” you yell even louder hoping she can here you.

Her attention was then drawn toward the grown at you. “Huh just a bug” she says to herself. “What a bug, I’m not a bug” you yell at her. “What” she says to herself, as if she was able to her your exact words.

She then proceeds to crouch down to get a better look at you. “I’m a person, a human” you shout at her as her face comes closer. “Agh, whaaaat” she yells falling back on to her butt with you still at the bottom of her feet.
11131.title: Sarada Uchiha.

111311.content:
“What is that” she says to herself. “I’m a person” you responded.

Your beat bet in this world is to just go with the flow, and not make it known about your real powers. Who knows, this could be fun, and you might just be able to use jutsu like they can.

Sarada quickly jumps forward going on her knees and hands to lean in closer to you.

“Are you some kind of bug, maybe Shino Sensei’s” she asks aloud. “No, I’m a real person, not some kind of bug” you respond. “You can talk. A person. How’s that even possible” she asks. “Uhh, not sure how to explain it” you respond. You hesitate and freeze as her finger comes toward you.

“It’s not safe to talk to you here, I don’t want to draw any unnecessary attention” she said. “What are you doing” you responded taking a single step away from her hand. “Oh uh, is okay if I pick you up, her just come onto my hand” she says place her hand flat on the ground.
111311.title: She recognizes you as a human

112.content:
This is a bit of a stretch, but I'm going to include the characters that didn't make it into the anime, it feels like lost potential. So here's how its going to work.

1. Gym Leaders and the Elite 4: This will include all the Gym Leaders and Elite 4 Members from both the Anime and the Games. Also, the Galor region will be included, but there is no Elite 4 members in Pokemon Sword and Shield. Brock and Misty are in this selection as well as in the "Anime Characters" Choice. Other characters like; Cynthia, Diantha, or any Gym Leader/ Elite 4 member will be in the 1st choice. The Alola Region has a unique version of this. Instead, they are called, "Trial Captains" and "Island Kahunas". However, they fall within this category.

2.Pokemon Professor: When you start your quest, you are greeted by the regions Head Professor as he/she explains what Pokemon are and helping you set up your character. Meaning that characters like Professor Oak, Juniper, etc. will be her. This also includes Professor Burnet. Even though she's not in the introduction, she is considered a professor.

3. Anime Characters: Like it says, this choice includes all the character's from the entire Pokemon anime series (so far). Not only will it include Team Rocket, it will add other characters like: Lillie, Lusamine, Bonnie, Max, Miette, and other characters are in this choice.
112.title: Gotta Peep them All!

113.title: One Piece.

choices: Leaving the island with Y/N inside his hat on his head. (Away we Go!)
1131.content:
As a kid, it had always been your dream to join the strawhats that you admired when you watched tv. Of course, you couldn't do it back then, but now you could. Let alone just joining the show, you could use your powers and surprise no one because those existed in the form of devil fruit. Joining Luffy's crew would be hard at any time other than the start, mainly because of Zoro, being the hardass that he is.

You decided to meet Luffy as a child right after he ate the Gum-Gum fruit and integrate yourself into the lore.

With that, you started shrinking to a pretty small size, maybe 6 inches or so. Not super noticeable but also not too small. After your shrinking was complete, you chanted the spell to go into the fictional world. As the spell finished you blinked your eyes. As they opened again, you were in a small village by the ocean. The town was named Foosha Villiage, or Windmill Villiage. You see where the windmill part came from, as there were many windmills scattered along the town. The area was quiet, the only sound you heard was the calm wind.

Breaking the silence, however, was the shrill voice of a young boy that you recognized as Monkey.D.Luffy. It was a somber tone of voice, contrary to his normal cheer.

"How come Shanks let that bandit pour Sake all over him. I thought he was a cool pirate but it seems he's just a chicken."


You chuckled softly, knowing that Shanks was just being the bigger man and not starting a conflict. As he walked in your direction you quickly grew yourself, surprising him.

"Hey kid, what's wrong? I couldn't help but hear you moping over there."

"HEY, I'M NOT MOPING!

After saying that, Luffy blinked, seemingly just now registering that a person suddenly appeared in front of him.

"WHERE'D YOU COME FROM!"

You put your hands up jokingly. "Easy there buddy, I just wanted to know what was wrong. To answer your question though, I was here the entire time, just smaller.

"Smaller?"

"It's my Devil Fruit Ability, to change sizes from small to big."

"Ooooh, like that thing Shanks got mad at me for eating a while back. I can stretch myself reaaaal long."

You give a grin. "That's pretty cool. You planning to be a pirate with that?"

"HECK YEAH! I'm gonna be a better pirate then dumb Shanks ever could be."

"Is that so? Well, you wanna be in the same crew when we grow up?" You put on a mock depressed face, "I wanted to be a pirate too but people think the power to shrink is useless so no one I ask cares."

"They're dumb heads then, shrinking is super awesome! Yeah! Let's be pirates together!"

"Thanks... Captain"

With that, Luffy and Y/N grew up together. The future of their journey is in your hands. When we see our two unlikely heroes again, They will be...
1131.title: Living out a dream.

114.content: Who of these lovely ladies do you explore? (You could add the guys if you want)
114.title: Welcome to Disboard

1141.content:
You were stumped, you couldn't think of where to go.

"Damn, there're so many places to go and people to see." You whined. "But who or where should I go to. WHO OR WHERE?!"

You spread your arms out and knocked into a shelf, which knocked down a few disc covers onto the floor. You proceeded to clean up after yourself until one cover caught your eye. The cover was labeled, "No Game No Life." You remembered that this was the first anime you watched when growing up. You also remembered that you had a crush on one of the character's; Shiro. Too bad it only had 1 season.

Suddenly, both questions have been answered. Without hesitation, you grabbed your staff and focused your power on both your size and dimension. After a few brief moments, you were absorbed by a blinding light. When you recovered your vision, you were standing on a fancy looking chair. You looked around your surroundings, but it's hard to tell, you believe it to be some sort of outdoor patio of the castle. Not even long after, you heard footsteps approach you. It's Shiro! And she has no idea that your there!

She positions her dress so the back of the dress is on the seat. Now you are face to face with her white panties. You looked at the bottom of the chair to find that she has taken her shoes off revealing her purple feet.

"Panty shots and feet?! How could this get any better?" You thought to yourself as you were filled with joy. As luck would have it, Shiro was eating a small snack, when a chunk landed beside you.

What do you do?

A: Enter Shiro's Panties.

B: Jump down and enter Shiro's shoe. (I'm not a big foot person, but I know people like this, so why don't you guys try it?)

C: Hop onto the crumb and give it a little bit of a "kick."
1141.title: Shiro

11413.content:
You decided to hitch a ride on the crumb before Shiro notices. It looked like it was part of a chocolate-chip cookie, hell, it smelled good too! Before long a shadow grew over you and looked up to see a giant hand. You quickly crawled toward the other side to avoid detection and waited.

Shiro didn't see you, but it looked like she did. Her red eyes observed the cookie piece with a blank expression. Without any warning, she threw the cookie into her mouth, unaware of your presence.

The impact of her tongue threw you off the crumb and you almost fell down her throat, but thankfully, you were able to roll to the left and grabbed the back tooth. You didn't want to enter her stomach yet. You then hurled yourself back onto her tongue. It last long because after 2 or 3 bites, you and the crumbs were thrown toward the back of her throat and swallowed.

You felt the walls of her throat squeezes you further down. You could hear Shiro's heart beating as you traveled further in. Eventually, you were dropped into her stomach. Bits and chunks of other cookies were already turned into mush, ready to be delivered into her body. You were about to get comfortable until a waterfall of white liquid fell from above.

"Is this......milk?" You asked yourself. It smelled sweet, but with the strong odor inside her stomach, it was hard to tell. Good news was it wasn't sticky. (Too far?)


What do you do now?

A: Wait it out. (Let nature takes its course)

B:Continue deeper. (Push your way through her digestive system while leaving the food behind.)

C: Climb up (Try to climb up her throat for a different area to explore.)
11413.title: Sweet Delights

11431.content:
(*Cough best girl Cough*)

You've always liked Jibril from her appearance and personality. Not to mention, she's cute. You found one of the light novels of: No Game No Life and placed it on the pedestal

"Ok, now where did I put my staff? I think in the closet?" You said. Your room wasn't very spacious in terms of storage. You opened the closet to find random junk you summoned while you tested the teleportation spell. You scavenged through the pile of weapons and potions, some were random items that you knew like a 4-Star Dragon Ball (I am hilarious and you will quote everything I say), while others were weird like a stone mask. You still have no idea how that thing works, but you swore that you heard someone whisper "Muda Muda" behind you.

"Damn it, where is tha-OW!" You yelled as you hit your head on a shelf. The staff fell into your hands. You rubbed your head from the injury, now you know to place your staff next to your bed. You focused on the manga as a green, water-like aura began to surround you. After a few seconds, you were absorbed by a white light.

When you regained your vision you appeared to be....outside? You thought that for a while until you turned around. You were on Jibril's body! She appeared to be resting on a lounge chair and in a bikini.

Where do you explore?

A: Head towards her upper body to play with her breasts or explore her mouth.

B: Head towards her vagina for some perverted fun or go to her feet. (If your into that)

11533333.title: To Love Ru?

115333331.content:
"...........Why didn't I think of this before?" You questioned yourself as you held your staff in your hands. You were right to question yourself, WHY DID YOU NOT THINK ABOUT THIS SOONER?! "To Love Ru" and "To Love Ru: Darkness", both are known for having really good fan service. You started to focus your spell on where you want to go and its obvious; The School! You didn't need an object for this spell, you already know the series by heart. As soon as you started focusing on the smell, you were immediately engulfed in a blinding white light.

When your vision returned, you were standing in the middle of the school's hallway. You immediately noticed the classroom on your left. The door was open wide enough for you to squeeze through and see who's there. However, you were only able to see one person and that was Tearju Lunatique. She appeared to be at her desk, grading some papers. You could sense some form of magic inside, which would mean that Lala, Momo, and Nana are there as well.

Further down the hallway, you could see two girls talking to each other. Those two girls were Yui Kotegawa and Haruna Sairenji. It looks like the hallway continues past them, probably if you explore, you could find more girls!

Lastly was the holy land for perverts; the girl's changing room! The door was closed, but you could slide under it and do some peeping.

Where do you go?

A: Enter the classroom. (There are more girls there then what I listed, so Mikan is there also.)

B:Head down the hallway (Like I said, if your not interested with these two, you could head further down to probably the nurse's office, plus she's hot!)

C: Crawl into the Girl's Changing room (Do I need to explain this one?......... ok: Mio, Risa, Saki, Rin, and Ayako are here. I needed to fill the space somewhere.)

P.S. If you have NO idea who these characters are or what this anime is about, please look it up and proceed with caution around other people. I called it "fan service" for a reason!

"Probably I read the spell wrong." You theorized. You looked back at the page you left it on and found the problem. You had the page on a chapter called: "Confetti Launcher."

Why is there a party trick in a spell book? Can't people just buy them at a party store or some shit?" You said.

info.brief_description: Shrink and transport yourself into your favorite anime, both aware and unaware allowed.
info.description:
You are a teen wizard with a die hard love for anime and cartoons. You have recently acquired a shrinking spell and had long since had a transportation spell that worked with fictional worlds and you decided to combine the two. The shrinking spell also makes you invulnerable to pain.


NEW RULE: You can just say "With the spell I entered (Media Title)" if that was what was putting you off of writing. Of course, don't only write that but you don't have to write a bunch of exposition before even getting to the show.

Rules
--------
Generally, I'll give 1k for a decent addition or maybe even 2k for an addition I especially like.
Both genders are allowed.
Please, at least use periods.
Try to sort your work into paragraphs.
